channel.title: Comments on: Productivity Is Not The Only Measurement
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Amelia @ IT Management
item.dc:creator: Amelia @ IT Management
item.description:
Very helpful post, Eli. Measurements are indeed valuable to organizations.
I also believe effective ways of gauging progress (or non-progress) should sit side-by-side with implementation of effective tools to enhance management, especially in the IT facet of an organization.
With useful IT management tools assisting people, departments are able to save time and improve the quality of their product or service while slicing costs.
item.content:encoded:
Very helpful post, Eli. Measurements are indeed valuable to organizations.

I also believe effective ways of gauging progress (or non-progress) should sit side-by-side with implementation of effective tools to enhance management, especially in the IT facet of an organization.

With useful IT management tools assisting people, departments are able to save time and improve the quality of their product or service while slicing costs.
